inputText:
# GTM Quest x Climatise: AI-Powered Go-To-Market Engineering

## Your End-to-End Emissions Solution Deserves an End-to-End GTM System

A proposal for building scalable, automated outbound infrastructure targeting 37 defined ICPs across UK carbon accounting.

---

# The Challenge: 37 ICPs, Complex Signals, Manual Chaos

Climatise has defined 37 Ideal Customer Profiles across 5 categories:

- Category A: Regulatory-Driven (12 ICPs) - SECR, NHS, PPN 006, PAS 2080
- Category B: Supply Chain Pressure (6 ICPs) - Tesco, Sainsburys, FMCG
- Category C: Voluntary/Values-Driven (3 ICPs) - B Corp, SBTi, CDP
- Category D: Sector-Specific (12 ICPs) - MATs, Universities, Manufacturing
- Category E: Emerging (4 ICPs) - Insurance, Franchises, Recruitment

Combined TAM: 100,000+ decision makers

Without automation, you are leaving pipeline on the table.

---

# Tier 1 Priority ICPs: Where We Start

Government Contract Bidders: 5,000+ companies, Critical urgency, PPN 006 Carbon Reduction Plan trigger

NHS Suppliers Tier 1: 2,000 companies, High urgency, April 2027 Scope 3 deadline

SECR-Obligated December Year-End: 3,300 companies, High urgency, 30 September annual deadline

SECR-Obligated March Year-End: 4,400 companies, High urgency, 31 December annual deadline

National Highways Suppliers: 500 companies, Critical urgency, PAS 2080 by end of 2025

15,200 high-intent companies with hard deadlines driving purchase urgency.

---

# The GTM Stack: Clay-Based Discovery with RevOps Backbone

Discovery Layer using Clay:
- Waterfall enrichment: Findy, Icypeas, Prospero
- Social signals via Trigify
- Hire and promotion tracking
- News and funding announcement scraping
- LinkedIn deep enrichment via Apify

Execution Layer:
- LaGrowthMachine for LinkedIn with 4G mobile proxy protection
- Instantly for email with final verification
- HubSpot as system of record
- Breakcold plus Surfe for frontline CRM

Data Infrastructure:
- Supabase or Neon for unlimited storage beyond Clay limits
- Custom scrapers: Find a Tender, bidstats.uk, Contract Finder API
- AI qualification into Slack for real-time alerts

---

# Signal-Triggered Outbound: Right Message, Right Time

Government Contract Signals:
- Daily scraper on Find a Tender and bidstats.uk
- AI qualification for carbon-relevant tenders
- Instant enrichment of winning and bidding companies
- Triggered campaign: We saw you just won a contract - PPN 006 requires a Carbon Reduction Plan

SECR Deadline Signals:
- Companies House year-end date extraction
- 6-9 month prep window targeting
- Countdown sequences: Your SECR deadline is in 6 months

NHS Supplier Signals:
- NHS SBS framework list monitoring
- Contract award tracking
- April 2027 is closer than you think messaging

---

# Personalisation at Scale: The Human Touch

No automation at the point of execution for high-value prospects.

- LinkedIn acceptance triggers human review, not auto-message
- Full LinkedIn profile enriched: academic background, career path, personality signals
- SDR receives context card: pain points, company signals, personal hooks
- Voice notes from real humans, not AI clones
- Colleague tracking for multi-threading into accounts

Tertiary markets: Fully automated sequences acceptable

Tier 1 prospects: 100% human-checked before first real message

---

# Content Engine: Authority That Converts

Gated Assets by ICP:
- SECR Deadline Countdown webinar series
- PPN 006 Carbon Reduction Plan Template
- NHS Supplier Carbon Roadmap Guide
- PAS 2080 Compliance Guide
- How to Report Carbon Data to Major Retailers

AEO Answer Engine Optimisation:
- Next.js components for Gen-AI discoverability
- Readable PDFs that drive results
- llms.txt implementation
- Live results already achieved on other projects

LinkedIn Authority Building:
- SuperGrow or Taplio for content scheduling
- HappyClapper for team amplification
- Targeted LinkedIn Ads with SmartLinks to track engagement

---

# Automation Architecture: Handover-Ready

Signal Sources feed into Clay Discovery which syncs to Supabase or Neon then triggers Campaign Execution

Signal Sources include: bidstats.uk, Find a Tender, Companies House

Clay Discovery handles: Waterfall Enrichment, LinkedIn Deep Scrape, News and Funding Alerts

Supabase or Neon provides: Unlimited Storage, RevOps Dashboards, Full Audit Trail

Campaign Execution via: LaGrowthMachine, Instantly, HubSpot Sync

Key principle: Deprecate Clay to discovery and enrichment orchestration layer. Build persistent RevOps infrastructure that internal teams can operate post-engagement.

---

# What Gets Built

Phase 1 Foundation:
- Supabase or Neon database architecture
- Clay workspace with ICP-specific tables
- Signal scrapers: Find a Tender, bidstats.uk, Companies House
- Initial enrichment waterfalls

Phase 2 Campaign Infrastructure:
- LaGrowthMachine setup with proper proxy configuration
- Instantly domains and warmup
- LinkedIn safety protocols and monitoring
- HubSpot integration and RevOps dashboards

Phase 3 Launch Tier 1 ICPs:
- Government Contract Bidders campaign live
- SECR December YE sequence active
- NHS Tier 1 outreach running
- Signal monitoring in Slack

Phase 4 Handover:
- Documentation and runbooks
- Team training sessions
- Ongoing optimisation support

---

# Investment Options

Flexible 2 Days Per Week Engagement

Workshops at 1000 GBP per day: Strategy sessions, ICP refinement, team training

Strategy, Coding and Building at 750 GBP per day: System architecture, Clay builds, integrations

Ongoing Support for 3 months at 500 GBP per day: Maintenance, optimisation, troubleshooting

Structure: 2 days per week flexible - can be spread across the week as needed. Not fixed blocks.

Terms: Weekly rolling break clause. 100% flexibility.

Optional: Business development involvement - can support with direct outreach and relationship building.

---

# Why GTM Quest

Operational Execution: Not strategy decks - working systems that run

RevOps-First Architecture: Built for handover, not dependency

LinkedIn Safety Expertise: 4G mobile proxies, proper protocols, zero flags to date

Signal-Triggered Outbound: Scraper-first approach beats list-buying

AI-Native Content: AEO, Gen-SEO, and llms.txt implementation experience

Local: Based in Borough - happy to meet in person or work remotely

---

# Next Steps

1. This Week: Confirm engagement scope and start date
2. Week 1: Workshop - finalise Tier 1 ICP prioritisation, map signal sources
3. Week 2-3: Build foundation infrastructure with Supabase, Clay, scrapers
4. Week 4 onwards: Launch first campaigns, iterate based on response data

Contact: dan@gtm.quest

Lets build a GTM system as sophisticated as your emissions platform.

textOptions.tone: Professional, confident, technical but accessible. B2B SaaS sales tone.
textOptions.audience: Lennon Harding-Wade, CEO of Climatise - technical founder who understands GTM, looking for execution support not strategy education

imageOptions.style: Clean, modern, tech-forward imagery. Green and sustainability themes where relevant. Data visualisations and dashboard mockups.

additionalInstructions: Use a professional, modern theme with navy blue and black as primary colors to match Climatise branding. Use Inter or DM Sans style fonts. Keep the design clean and tech-forward, similar to a SaaS pitch deck. Include data visualisation elements where tables are shown. The deck should feel premium but not flashy - credible and operational.
